title: Asia Album: Fascinating performance staged as China, Malaysia kick off Year of Culture and Tourism
content:
Photo taken on Jan. 19, 2020 shows an artist dancing at the opening ceremony of China-Malaysia Year of Culture and Tourism 2020 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. (Xinhua/Chong Voon Chung)
KUALA LUMPUR, Jan. 20 (Xinhua) -- Time travel seems impossible but you can still come back to ancient China by watching performances! Let's enjoy the beauty of culture, opera and traditional musical instrument at the opening ceremony of the China-Malaysia Year of Culture and Tourism 2020 in Kuala Lumpur.
Photo taken on Jan. 19, 2020 shows artists performing Chinese traditional opera at the opening ceremony of China-Malaysia Year of Culture and Tourism 2020 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. (Xinhua/Chong Voon Chung)
Photo taken on Jan. 19, 2020 shows artists playing Chinese traditional musical instruments at the opening ceremony of China-Malaysia Year of Culture and Tourism 2020 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. (Xinhua/Chong Voon Chung)
Photo taken on Jan. 19, 2020 shows an artist performing Chinese traditional opera at the opening ceremony of China-Malaysia Year of Culture and Tourism 2020 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. (Xinhua/Chong Voon Chung)
